summary: Good for new characters starting equipment and items for mages warriors and thiefs :)
descriptionHtml:
First mod i have ever made its pretty simple but nice for new characters . I seperated this into three txt documents .                             
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
       The mage kit includes 5 potion of extreme magicka , 5 grand soul gems full ,raise zombie spell,soul trap,detect life,adept robes ,conjure flame atronach and the muffle spell .
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The thief kit includes 25 lockpicks, leather armor , leather bracers , leather boots of major sneaking , hunting bow , 2 orcish daggers , 150 steel arrows .
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                               
 The warrior kit includes 10 potions of healing , silver greatsword , skyforge steel sword ,  steel plate armor set and steel shield of major blocking .


                                            INSTALLATION 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just simply download the file you want and place into your data folder . Then in game open up the console using the ~ button and enter bat magekit , bat warriorkit , or bat thiefkit depending on which one you downloaded . 



There should be no problems at all but if something does not work right let me know . Also please comment as i said this is my first mod ever i would like feedback also what should i add to make this better . I want this to be a good mod for people starting out new characters . Thanks and enjoy ! :)
author: Legend Xz
